NSE top gainers & losers

Source: R/nse-stock.R
nse_stock_top_base.Rd

Fetch top gainers and losers for the last trading session.

nse_stock_top_gainers()

nse_stock_top_losers()

Value

A tibble with the following columns:

symbol

NSE ticker.

series

Equity (EQ).

last_corp_announcement_date

Last corporate announcement date.

last_corp_announcement

Last corporate announcement.

open_price

Open price.

high_price

High price.

low_price

Low price.

last_traded_price

Last traded price.

prev_close_price

Previous close price.

percent_change

Percentage change in price.

traded_quantity

Total traded quantity.

turnover

Turnover in lakhs.

Examples

# \donttest{
nse_stock_top_gainers()
#> # A tibble: 10 x 12
#>    symbol series last_corp_annou~ last_corp_annou~ open_price high_price
#>    <chr>  <chr>  <date>           <chr>                 <dbl>      <dbl>
#>  1 BAJAJ~ EQ     2019-07-11       Annual General ~      3167       3270 
#>  2 BAJAJ~ EQ     2019-07-11       Annual General ~      8975       9127.
#>  3 TCS    EQ     2019-10-17       Interim Dividen~      2028.      2062 
#>  4 KOTAK~ EQ     2019-07-12       Annual General ~      1634.      1650 
#>  5 INFY   EQ     2019-10-23       Interim Dividen~       693.       700.
#>  6 HDFC   EQ     2019-07-19       Annual General ~      2311.      2325 
#>  7 HEROM~ EQ     2019-07-16       Annual General ~      2402       2435.
#>  8 BHART~ EQ     2019-04-23       Rights 19:67 @ ~       463.       465.
#>  9 BAJFI~ EQ     2019-07-11       Annual General ~      3940.      3995 
#> 10 CIPLA  EQ     2019-07-31       Annual General ~       465        466.
#> # ... with 6 more variables: low_price <dbl>, last_traded_price <dbl>,
#> #   prev_close_price <dbl>, percent_change <dbl>, traded_quantity <dbl>,
#> #   turnover_in_lakhs <dbl>
nse_stock_top_losers()
#> # A tibble: 10 x 12
#>    symbol series last_corp_annou~ last_corp_annou~ open_price high_price
#>    <chr>  <chr>  <date>           <chr>                 <dbl>      <dbl>
#>  1 YESBA~ EQ     2019-06-03       Annual General ~       64.1       65.2
#>  2 INFRA~ EQ     2019-08-22       Interim Dividen~      270.       270. 
#>  3 TATAS~ EQ     2019-07-04       Annual General ~      418        419. 
#>  4 ADANI~ EQ     2019-07-26       Annual General ~      380        380  
#>  5 ZEEL   EQ     2019-07-15       Annual General ~      297        299  
#>  6 JSWST~ EQ     2019-07-08       Annual General ~      267.       268. 
#>  7 GRASIM EQ     2019-08-08       Annual General ~      805        805  
#>  8 VEDL   EQ     2019-07-04       Annual General ~      144.       144. 
#>  9 GAIL   EQ     2019-08-08       Dividend - Rs 0~      126.       127. 
#> 10 INDUS~ EQ     2019-08-08       Annual General ~     1579.      1580  
#> # ... with 6 more variables: low_price <dbl>, last_traded_price <dbl>,
#> #   prev_close_price <dbl>, percent_change <dbl>, traded_quantity <dbl>,
#> #   turnover_in_lakhs <dbl>
# }
